title: The Best Ryder Cup WAGs of All-Time
headline: The Best Ryder Cup WAGs of All-Time
description: The Ryder Cup is the best time of the year to see the wives and girlfriends of American and European players. Here are our all-time favorite WAG photos from the Ryder Cup, including Dowd Simpson, Amy Mickelson and Kandi Mahan.
short_headline: The Best Ryder Cup WAGs of All-Time
page_title: The Best Ryder Cup WAGs of All-Time
slug: The Best Ryder Cup WAGs of All-Time
body: The Ryder Cup is the best time of the year to see the wives and girlfriends of American and European players. Here are our all-time favorite WAG photos from the Ryder Cup, including Dowd Simpson, Amy Mickelson and Kandi Mahan.
